attributes.action: To allow schools to hide a students LGBTQ involvement from parents.
attributes.background: Most schools feel like they need to make the students parents aware if a student tells them about an involvement to the LGBTQ community. Students want to have control over how and when there parents know, this is because some parents are homophobic and anti-LGBTQ.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636802
Do not require schools to tell parents their child is transgender/non-binary

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639904
Do not issue guidance making it unsafe for school students to question gender
